title: The Intersectional Feminist
description: The If Mag, a GatsbyJS and Netlify CMS Blog

home.title: Hi! I'm The If Mag
home.description: I have been specifically designed to become a digital home for designers and developers, help them build amazing professional looking websites with ease. You don't have to worry about nitty gritty of web hosting services to run a blog and yet take full advantage of CMS to manage content :)

aboutPage.about: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet.
